TEXT.S: alang Tapowaray (Saranawan, ) ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Nakahama go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 124 buwan, 347 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 93 kyan ku 323 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 7 kyan ku 24 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 89 , binah lihuyan s'uli 4 . maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Tapowaray hya' ga bsilung. tay 'zil na Tapowaray hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na Tapowaray hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Tapowaray hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Tapowaray hya' ga Cikadaan. tay mkyahu' na Tapowaray hya' ga Sadipongan. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan alang Tapowaray ga ungat pqwasan biru. khu skwan biru maki 1 khu skwan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
